I got two questions. First is that i just dedicated myself to create a gamebook using quest. And now i just discovered that you can only publish the game as a .quest file. The things is, i want to convert to or publish as an Html+javascript file. Is there a way of doing this? Because Second, im having a hard time looking for a detailed guide regarding making gamebooks with quest. Are there any place i could find a more detailed guide?

I might mave heard about questjs but they say it was comolicated to use.

Thanks for your time.
Posts.HTML:
I got two questions. First is that i just dedicated myself to create a gamebook using quest. And now i just discovered that you can only publish the game as a .quest file. The things is, i want to convert to or publish as an Html+javascript file. Is there a way of doing this? Because Second, im having a hard time looking for a detailed guide regarding making gamebooks with quest. Are there any place i could find a more detailed guide?
